Palmer Larson

Software Developer

Web Developer

IT Specialist

Java Developer

I'm Web Software Development Student at Madison Area Technical College. I currently work as an IT Support Specialist at EatStreet Inc. and have a bachelor's degree in Criminology from the University of Wisconsin - Whitewater.

Previously, I worked as a Deputy Sheriff at the Dane County Sheriff’s office in Madison, WI. After following the route of Law Enforcement through college and into the professional field I decided to follow my true interests leaving Law Enforcement and into IT. Though, this may seem like a strange career transition the valuable skills I have learned througout my time in the academy and in the field are many. I have learned many interpersonal and self-discipline skills, and most important problem solving skills. So far, throughout my schooling and IT career these learned skills from my past career have proven themselves invaluable and will continue to do so.

Projects

Task List API - Node/Express

Class Project - Spring 2022 (Advanced JavaScript) API built for listing tasks, features include: GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE. Built to store into a JSON file for project reqs, Ideally dB would be used. Usefull in learning Node/Express JS
Wealth & Debt Evaluator - Java

Class Project - Spring 2022 (Enterprise Java) Wdev receives user parameters to generate and display charts. This application was developed to practice the following: User Handling with AWS Cognito, CRUD, JSPs/Servlets, Git version control, ORM Framework (Hibernate), implementing outsourced API.
Weather Catcher - JavaScript

Class Project - Spring 2022 (Advanced JavaScript) Built to learn API implmentation with XML HttpRequest.
Portfolio - HTML/CSS/BootStrap

Personal Project - Spring 2022, Built to display skills and work to potential employers.
Tax Calculator - JavaScript

Class Project - Spring 2022 (Advanced JavaScript) Built to learn ES6.
PowerBall Simulator - JavaScript

Personal Project - Spring 2021 JavaScript project built for fun (not optimized).
BootStrap Project - HTML/CSS/BootStrap

Team API project - Java
